website_summaries.verdict: Gleaming stainless steel and a dual filter brewing system makes 1 to 4 cups of barista-worthy coffee – with no extra paper filters to buy.
pros: Durable construction and takes little space to store
Those who have used a French press feel this makes comparable coffee without nearly as many grounds left over, and without the potential breakage
Despite being steel, the dripper isn't too hot to pick up after use
cons: Users report that because there are no filters, the unit will clog if not cleaned with every use

customer_reviews.title: Useless after a month
customer_reviews.text: Even after cleaning, (and always using a paper filter) this dripper grew so clogged it would not drip. Useless piece of equipment, I'm about to punch holes in it to keep using a paper filter in it. We tried scrubbing, soaping, running through the dishwasher to no avail. The dripper remains clogged. This has caused many burned fingertips. Hate this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan A.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to believe
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to believe, but the bad reviews are true. It now takes me 20 minutes to make a cup of coffee, and it’s cold by the time I drink it. I have tried every cleaning method- dishwasher, scrub brush, vinegar. Nothing helps. I even tried paper filters inside the filter! Now my return window is closed after owning this for 6 weeks. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T Bernardi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: You won't need a coffee filter, but you will need a paper napkin to tap-tap-tap the used coffee grounds onto if you expect to save your drain from grounds. I normally do just a quick warm rinse and let air dry. I just discovered to get any grounds (if any) or staining completely out, soak in hot water with some white vinegar for however long, and then rinse well. Comes out looking new. They did a great job on their stainless steel mesh design. The little protruding handle is not hot to the touch. We use it daily and we are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Skyway Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: Stops up very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I used this filter hoping to replace paper filters altogether and to get more flavorful pour overs. I enjoyed it for about two months before it got slow. I washed it after every use and deep cleaned with vinegar regularly. But now, after less than a year of ownership, it is too slow for any kind of use. Even with a coarse grind, it takes over ten minutes to get eight ounces poured through. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For you health
customer_reviews.text: I took note of recent studies indicating that filtered coffee is good for you and unfiltered (ex. French Press style) will shorten your life. Ordered this Maranello Caffé Pour Over Coffee Dripper Stainless Steel Reusable Drip Cone Coffee Filter and revised my recipe. I still brew 4 minutes in a French Press but without it's stainless filter. Next, I line the Maranello with a cheap and readily available standard coffee filter and pour over into the cup. The result is French Press coffee fully filtered. The combo of the Maranello and paper filter fully drains in roughly 90 seconds which is acceptable. Great flavor and safe!
customer_reviews.author: T. F.

customer_reviews.title: Too Fine....
customer_reviews.text: This filter's holes are just too fine (small). Even though I rinse and clean the filter out immediately after use, the filter becomes clogged within a week, requiring a 'deep cleaning'. Whatever diameter holes the manufacturer selected, they need to increase the size. I'd much rather deal with some small amount of coffee grounds in my cup than to constantly be deep cleaning this filter. Too much work.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well after 10-20 times
customer_reviews.text: After using the device approximately 20 times it clogged. I tried twice to clean and descale the device per the manufacturers instructions. No change, still clogged and does not filter through, even when using a course grind.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee and easy to use. Reputable company.
customer_reviews.text: Makes great coffee, easy to use, easy to clean, dishwasher safe. It is reusable, so no paper filters. No plastic which is another huge plus. I am very happy with this and recommend it! It arrived timely and includes tips for an excellent cup of coffee. The company gets high marks from me and I have no hesitation to buy from them again. (Just to note, I did a lot of research before buying and am delighted with my purchase.)
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Makes Coffee the Way I Like It
customer_reviews.text: Makes coffee fast and is easy to clean. The insert has instructions to follow if it starts to drain slow. Fits nicely over my big tumbler. I like to make my own coffee so it's exactly the way I like it every time. No more paper coffee filter remnants in my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: HighDeeHoe

customer_reviews.title: Gets clogged!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for week or so. Then it gets clogged. Tried soaking in vinegar and we scrub it with a little brillo pad before every use. It still clogs and drips very slowly. I was very excited to use this dripper and stop buying paper filters, very disappointing. Going back to my old plastic cone till I find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen DeMichele

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! You do need to clean this filter every time you use it. I turn it upside down over the kitchen sink, turn on the water, use the spray attachment on the faucet and It never clogs with coffee grounds. Buy this filter! It’s so much better than using paper filters and plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bmb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent filter for pour over coffee
customer_reviews.text: Since this is stainless we run it through the dishwasher after 4-5 uses. Makes great pour over coffee with no silt at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: MV Fan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to use w paper filters
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to stop using a plastic coffee filterase holder. Will continue to use paper filters w it bc when I tried it w/o the paper filter, the grounds didn't come out into garbage, I had to dig them out w a spoon as I don't want to wash grounds down sink, and the point of the cone didn't rinse clean, I had to lift out clogged grounds w Kleenex. Filtered no differently than w paper, I expected water to drip thru more slowly, but it moved at the same speed. I like it to replace plastic but coffee didn't taste any different. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: GRETA G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for your coffee and the world.
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee filter. First, the switch from paper to metal lets you taste a clearer version of the coffee. I was really surprised what a difference it was. It is well constructed and easier than expected to clean. Simply bang out the grinds in the trash then wash the outside of the filter. There doesn’t seem to be any build up of crud on the net. We have already saved the cost by not purchasing paper filters, plus less impact on the environment. Win!
customer_reviews.author: Backlight

customer_reviews.title: My updated review: It clogs too easily as others have said and is unusable.
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my previous 4 star rating. The filter is unusable because it clogs and coffee won’t drip through. I have cleaned it almost immediately after every use and have left it soaking in hot soapy water, tried a hard bristle brush, but something must be stuck in side in the very fine mesh because it no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Salloway

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Good Tasting Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This coffee cone filter makes good coffee fast. I was using a paper filter with a plastic filter cone and it took much longer to brew a cup. Also, stainless steel leaves no flavor behind. It cleans fine, but I have to spend time scraping out the coffee grounds, whereas before all I had to do was toss away the paper filter. Otherwise, a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Free Bird

customer_reviews.title: I had to return mine.
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to using this and dumping my single serve coffee maker, but the ring around the bottom came loose on the second use and allowed A LOT of coffee grounds to spill through into my cup of coffee. There was no way to resolve that other than using a paper filter (the purpose of this item is to avoid using paper filters), so I decided to return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brunning

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote this review originally for the one I bought myself. My daughter travels with her glass French press. I suggested she use this. She likes how easy it is to travel with, doesn’t like how it uses more coffee than her French press. I thought it was time to give up the reusable kcup (no more plastic). I love this. I’ve had it for 3 months now, no issues. Coffee taste better done this way. I love that I can do coffee anywhere there is hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews when I purchased this product, I only use it with a coffee filter to avoid clogging. But I prefer my coffee filtered anyway. Cleans easily and I love that it isn't plastic. I love pour over coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as bad as others reviews
customer_reviews.text: The mesh is finer than it appears on the photo, which is great it allows for longer steeping. It's easy to clean, and dishwasher friendly. Some of the other reviews mentioned cleaning challenges. Follow the instructions, use a medium coarse grind. A plus product. No more need to buy coffee filters! Two months of use and going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Blum

customer_reviews.title: Very easy pour over
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and the best thing about it is you don’t have to buy filters. It is some what easy to clean if you use regular ground and not fine grounds (fine tends to get stuck in the mesh) and if you don’t like the oils in your coffee than you might want to buy filters.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: If you love coffee
customer_reviews.text: Don't follow instructions. Grind it to as fine a powder as possible, put way more than you need in, and use this. Yes, it makes a tremendous difference. Yes it's better than a French press. Yes it's better than using filters. Maximum benefit from fine grind. If you do a medium grind, you may as well use filters.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed that finally I can drink coffee like in Europe
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed that finally I can drink coffee like in Europe, it's soft and at the same time rich. It's also easy on your stomach if you have sensitive one and prone to heartburns.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality And Eco-Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get into pour over coffee, but did not want to waste a bunch of paper filters. I found this product, and it does an excellent job! It is also really easy to clean. It is metal, and therefore gets a bit hot after doing a pour over. So careful where you touch it when you clean it if you do so right after pouring! But overall, I really like mine and use it nearly every day.
customer_reviews.author: MrDavey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This company has outstanding customer service! I had a small issue with the product and contacted the company. They responded immediately and offered to send a replacement. I received that within a couple days and was back up brewing coffee again. As much as I love this product, I love the customer service even more. Such a pleasure to do business with a company that cares about its customers. We host a lot of overnight visitors and the coffee drinkers are all amazed at what a great cup of coffee this little dripper makes. They have requested we send them a link to order one for themselves and we have happily done so.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pour over
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent pour over. The attention to detail and quality are top notch. The base is polished to a mirror shine and is a heavier gauge than I expected. The filter basket has a kind of rigid outer shell with I'm assuming laser cut holes and the inside is lined with a super fine mesh. There are holes(tiny) on the bottom and no sediment gets into the cup. It must be a rather coarse grind or the mesh will drain veeerrry slow. I'm very satisfied and would recommend as well as buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brinkleberry

customer_reviews.title: glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my individual coffee drip cone. The flavor comes through amazing. I love bold coffee and this makes a wonderful bold cup of coffee with absolutely no bitterness
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cup of coffee

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit of doing to get the right grind on my coffee so that grounds would not leak through this filter, but once I did, I have found this to be a really great tool. Its easy to use; easy to clean; easy.
customer_reviews.author: maggielou

customer_reviews.title: The best coffee I've  ever made.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and clean! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and clean, also keeps the flavor of the coffee without adding the paper filter smell! Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars (Update: Three)

I have been very happy with it and have been thinking about getting another one. But now it seems to be coming apart at the interior seam, which I imagine will impact performance. It's more than a year and a half that I have this but that still seems toi soon for the item to be coming apart. --- It does what It claims. So far, no clogging, but it's only been a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked well while it lasted, never clogged, makes good coffee. Unfortunately this type of cone requires knocking out the grounds which, in my case, led to the top ring breaking free of the cone after 9 months using it maybe twice a week. It looks nice and appears well made, lots of spot welds at both top and bottom but it's just not a robust design in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: DucMon

customer_reviews.title: Use the right coffee and it works like a charm for a single cup
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make one cup of coffee at a time. It is perfect for that use and perhaps I should give it five stars, but because it is a limited use item I gave 4. If you generally make one cup for yourself in the morning, find the blend and grind you like and you can make a fine cup of coffee every time. I found it to be better than a press for that purpose, btw - no grinds in my cup.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: no more paper filters
customer_reviews.text: For 30 years I've been using the Melitta over the cup coffee dripper, which required a paper filter. Some filters almost never stayed in place and grounds would get in the coffee. Other filters were so thick it took forever to brew a cup of coffee. The Maranello dripper is perfect - no paper filter, no grounds in the coffee, and it brews in no time. It's sturdy on the cup and easy to clean. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: NJR

customer_reviews.title: I love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. I use it everyday. I wanted an alternative to the black plastic one and this was a perfect match for the perfect cup of coffee in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: britney

customer_reviews.title: Great design easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and design. No mess when brewing. The screen rinses out easily after brewing. I look forward to making many cups of coffee with this. I see a second one in my future for camping trips..
customer_reviews.author: Brad Webb

customer_reviews.title: Cut down our paper use
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased 2 more Maranello pour-over filters. Bought the first one about a month ago & loved it. We’re trying to cut down paper consumption & these filters allow us to give up our paper pour-over filters.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, wish I bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: Makes a fantastic cup of coffee (or, at least, a far better cup than my cheapo walmart coffee maker). Easy to clean, easy to use, doesn't require paper filters.
customer_reviews.author: Delmas Crum

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a low cost...  We dig it at work...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My co-worker and I use it at work. We like quality coffee and the office makes sub par coffee throughout the day. The pour over allows us to bring our own beans... We also use the hand grinder from this same company... It’s made really well and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hoerske

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: The Maranello Caffe cone drip coffee maker is well constructed with a filter mesh so fine you will have no grounds in your fresh brew. It’s the cleanest, simplest and most efficient way to make coffee. No waste and no more expensive single use cups. It's also very sturdy and travels nicely. I keep one at home as well as the office and plan on gifting a few to my coffee drinking friends during the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flavor, better than pour overs that use paper filters. Just be sure to descale and deep clean it occasionally per instructions or it will plug up.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel cone is easy way to make pour over coffee but still prefer paper filters for flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the stainless steel drip cone as a back-up when I run out of paper filters when making my pour over coffee. I still prefer the paper filter for pour over coffee, it provides a richer flavor. The stainless steel cone is a good, easy to use backup.
customer_reviews.author: transpo guy

customer_reviews.title: Initially excellent, but over time it gets slower and slower.
customer_reviews.text: Tried using a bleach solution, and of course it got better, but it never comes back to its initial promise. Too slow.

customer_reviews.title: Paperless saves trees
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use at college. She loves it and I do too. Saves money on paper filters
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: We're not sure how to clean this, and after a month of great coffee, we can't get it to "pour over." I will have to spend some time with it when I get a chance.
customer_reviews.author: geislerjen

customer_reviews.title: Works good !
customer_reviews.text: I like it way better than the one I had with a glass carafe. It’s much simpler. Only problem is that we use large 22-24 oz cups and the platform is not quite big enough to keep the filter from wobbling on top of the cups. No disasters yet 😊

customer_reviews.title: Like it

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

It transcends being a mere kitchen tool; looks and feels more like a piece of art. Easy to use, easy to wash. I'm going to buy some more for christmas gifts this year.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product really easy to use, just put it on the top of any cup, add your favorite coffee then pour boiled water. Enjoy it !!
customer_reviews.author: SL007

customer_reviews.title: Good pour over coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I have a different one of these and it doesn’t work that well because it clogs and takes forever to drip thru . This one seems perfect so far

customer_reviews.title: Works great!

customer_reviews.title: No more messy french press!!

And no more super dark or bitter coffee from my messy french press. The instructions are simple and easy to follow too! It fits all my coffee mugs, even the largest.
customer_reviews.author: Shannah Zamora

customer_reviews.title: ... only coffee drinker in my house and this is perfect for making 1 cup
customer_reviews.text: I'm the only coffee drinker in my house and this is perfect for making 1 cup! So fresh and this is super easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and feels stable and safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a travel pour through coffee filter. It works great but I find I like to use it even for making a single mug of coffee. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few days but I love it. Really simplifies making one cup of coffee. The coffee tastes better to me than in my French press. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: barbara breece

customer_reviews.title: Great cup of coffee, fell apart in 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 6 weeks ago, use twice a day. I used to use plastic Melitta drip cone with paper filter. Maranello produces a superior cup of coffee. Easy to clean, rinse immediately with warm water. I use a course grind which probably helps the filter from clogging. Unfortunately this product fell apart after 6 weeks of use. The top metal rim fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Sean W. Condon

customer_reviews.title: It was great before it broke.
customer_reviews.text: I got about 4 months of use before it fell apart. The Top ring just came right off just after making a cup of coffee. I am not sure the life of the the product but I wish it would have lasted a while longer since I only have 1 cup a day. It really made an enjoyable cup of coffee though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It’s not over - follow  the directions to clean it !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I want! Takes up no space, Cuts down on paper etc. I kept reading that it was hard to clean, but the directions say to descale with vinegar and water 1 x every 1 or 2 weeks- So that should be easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great all-in-one pour over filter
customer_reviews.text: Love that we don’t have to use/trash paper filters. Easy to use and clean. Sturdy, nicely sized platform base fits smaller and larger coffee cups alike. We first used on our camping trip, and now use at home since the coffee flavor is so much better than the k-cups weak (to me anyway) coffee! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Miller

customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using a French press to make coffee for years because I like the flavor but I hate the process and time it takes to make. When I saw this and read the reviews I decided to give it a try. This is sooo much easier and faster than my French press and makes equally delicious coffee. The extra bonus is that there are no grounds or coffee sedement in the bottom of my cup now. I’m very happy with this l!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sykola

customer_reviews.title: I liked this filter for the first few days -- until ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this filter for the first few days -- until it broke while I was tapping the grounds out on the edge of my compost bin. The entire steel ring around the top came off and cannot be reattached. It doesn't snap back on. It's unusable as is now. Too bad. I don't like to spend $17+ on a product that only lasts a few days.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great cup

customer_reviews.title: great tasting coffee no clogging
